dict.acceptation: （大学、银行等规模大的）机构；惯例，制度，规定，建立；社会事业机构；<口>名人，名物；

sent.orig: Institution outweighs technology, so what is institution?
sent.trans: 制度重于技术，制度又是什么？

sent.orig: The healthiness of the supervision institution is the precondition of the stable and effective financial institution.
sent.trans: 监管机构的健全是金融机构稳定高效运行的前提。

sent.orig: Marriage is a fine institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.
sent.trans: 婚姻是一种好的制度，但是我不准备加入这种制度。

sent.orig: The institution of rescission of contracts is an important institution in modern contract law.
sent.trans: 合同解除制度是现代合同法中的一项重要制度。

sent.orig: Base on the"Academic Institution", the paper discussed the reasons and seriously thought of the problems.
sent.trans: 文章基于“学术性机构”这一角度出发，对这些因素进行了探讨和分析。
